PHRASE.LANG: kName
HGL Creature Habitat Bundle
Pack environnement pour Créature HGL
HGL-Unterschlupfpaket
Pacchetto habitat creatura di HGL
Paquete de Hábitat de criatura HGL
HGL 생명체 서식지 번들
HGL Creature Habitat Bundle
HGL生物棲息處組合包
HGL生物棲息處組合包
kDesc

Purchasing this bundle unlocks the Troops Creature, the Critters Creature, the Sonics Creature and the Undead Creature for use in HGL Combat and the HGL Creature Habitat.


This bundle contains:
 HGL Creature Habitat
 HGL Creature Statue - Troops
 HGL Head Symbol - Troops (Male)
 HGL Head Symbol - Troops (Female)
 HGL Creature Statue - Critters
 HGL Head Symbol - Critters (Male)
 HGL Head Symbol - Critters (Female)
 HGL Creature Statue - Sonics
 HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Male)
 HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Female)
 HGL Creature Statue - Undead
 HGL Head Symbol - Undead (Male)
 HGL Head Symbol - Undead (Female) [#Legal]

Acheter ce pack pour déverrouiller les Créatures Troops, Critters, Sonics et Undead que vous pourrez utiliser dans HGL Combat et dans l'environnement pour Créature HGL.


Ce pack comprend : 
 Environnement pour Créature HGL
 Statue de Créature HGL - Troops
 Symbole flottant HGL - Troops (homme)
 Symbole flottant HGL - Troops (femme)
 Statue de Créature HGL - Critters
 Symbole flottant HGL - Critters (homme)
 Symbole flottant HGL - Critters (femme)
 Statue de Créature HGL - Sonics
 Symbole flottant HGL - Sonics (homme)
 Symbole flottant HGL - Sonics (femme)
 Statue de Créature HGL - Undead
 Symbole flottant HGL - Undead (homme)
 Symbole flottant HGL - Undead (femme) [#Legal]

Mit diesem Paket erhältst du die Spielfiguren "Troops", "Critters", "Sonics" und "Undead" und schaltest sie für HGL Combat und den HGL-Unterschlupf frei.


Dieses Paket enthält:
 HGL-Unterschlupf
 HGL-Statue – Troops
 HGL-Fansymbol – Troops (Herren)
 HGL-Fansymbol – Troops (Damen)
 HGL-Statue – Critters
 HGL-Fansymbol – Critters (Herren)
 HGL-Fansymbol – Critters (Damen)
 HGL-Statue – Sonics
 HGL-Fansymbol – Sonics (Herren)
 HGL-Fansymbol – Sonics (Damen)
 HGL-Statue – Undead
 HGL-Fansymbol – Undead (Herren)
 HGL-Fansymbol – Undead (Damen) [#Legal]

Acquistando questo pacchetto, sbloccherai le creature Troops, Critters, Sonics e Undead da utilizzare in HGL Combat e l'habitat delle creature.


Questo pacchetto contiene:
 Habitat creatura di HGL
 Statua creatura di HGL - Troops
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Troops (uomo)
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Troops (donna)
 Statua creatura di HGL - Critters
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Critters (uomo)
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Critters (donna)
 Statua creatura di HGL - Sonics
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Sonics (uomo)
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Sonics (donna)
 Statua creatura di HGL - Undead
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Undead (uomo)
 Simbolo sulla testa di HGL - Undead (donna) [#Legal]

Al comprar este paquete, desbloqueas las criaturas Troops, Critters, Sonics y Undead para usarlas en Combate HGL y en el Hábitat de criatura HGL.


Este paquete contiene:
 Hábitat de criatura HGL
 Estatua de criatura HGL: Troops
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Troops (hombre)
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Troops (mujer)
 Estatua de criatura HGL: Critters
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Critters (hombre)
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Critters (mujer)
 Estatua de criatura HGL: Sonics
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Sonics (hombre)
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Sonics (mujer)
 Estatua de criatura HGL: Undead
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Undead (hombre)
 Símbolo HGL para la cabeza: Undead (mujer) [#Legal]

이 번들을 구매하시면 HGL 전투와 HGL 생물체 서식지에서 사용할 수 있는 트룹스 생명체, 크리터스 생명체, 소닉 생명체, 그리고 언데드 생명체를 해제할 수 있습니다.


이 번들에는 다음 아이템이 포함됩니다:

 ●HGL 생명체 서식지
 ●HGL 생명체 조각상 - 트룹스
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 트룹스 (남성)
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 트룹스 (여성)
 ●HGL 생명체 조각상 - 크리터스
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 크리터스 (남성)
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 크리터스 (여성)
 ●HGL 생명체 조각상 - 소닉
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 소닉 (남성)
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 소닉 (여성)
 ●HGL 생명체 조각상 - 언데드
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 언데드 (남성)
 ●HGL 머리 심볼 - 언데드 (여성) 

※구입하면, 해당 카테고리에 각 아이템이 추가됩니다. [#Legal]

Purchasing this bundle unlocks the Troops Creature, the Critters Creature, the Sonics Creature and the Undead Creature for use in HGL Combat and the HGL Creature Habitat.


This bundle contains:
 ・HGL Creature Habitat
 ・HGL Creature Statue - Troops
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Troops (Men)
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Troops (Women)
 ・HGL Creature Statue - Critters
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Critters (Men)
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Critters (Women)
 ・HGL Creature Statue - Sonics
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Men)
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Sonics (Women)
 ・HGL Creature Statue - Undead
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Undead (Men)
 ・HGL Head Symbol - Undead (Women) 

※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories. [#Legal]

購買這個組合包以獲得Troops生物、Critters生物、Sonics生物和Undead生物的使用權，在HGL戰鬥及HGL生物棲息處中使用。

 本組合包包括以下道具。

 ●HGL生物棲息處
 ●HGL生物塑像 - Troops
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Troops(男用)
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Troops(女用)
 ●HGL生物塑像 - Critters
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Critters(男用)
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Critters(女用)
 ●HGL生物塑像 - Sonics
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Sonics(男用)
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Sonics(女用)
 ●HGL生物塑像 - Undead
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Undead(男用)
 ●HGL頭上標誌 - Undead(女用) 

※購買後，各道具將被置於對應的類別內。 [#Legal]
